EmailTemplate.name: !Private Aviation Strategy
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Private Aviation Strategy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Are you aware of all the changes in the private aviation market? How do you separate the hype from the reality?
-Private aviation apps -New membership programs -Fractional fleet refreshments -Shrinking pilot workforce
Aviation Portfolio proactively, and in real-time, advises on solutions and adjustments that give buyers an advantage in decision-making around private aviation.
Can we schedule 5 minutes to discuss your overall aviation strategy?
Jenny
Jenny Lell | Aviation Portfolio® | Santa Monica, CA | 310-460-9219 | Fly Smart. Pay Right.™
